title: My pixel lost IMEI in dialer after updating to Android 10, and can't connect to the carrier.
content: Hello.  After updating my Pixel 1 to Android 10, IMEI disappeared in the dialer application, it says "unknown".  But in the settings it is displayed correctly.  Also, I can’t connect to the operator’s network, although the phone sees it.  The sim card is read correctly, since I can go to the sim menu.  What can i try to fix it? I have stock rom, bootloader is locked. The phone was purchased as Verizon, but now it has a different operator.
